body.p: BIRTHS A son, Knute Adolph, was born March 8th, 1939, to Mr. and Mrs. Knute Horn, of Melrose, at the Galesville hospital. A son, Roy Rolland, was born on ” March 9, 1939, at the hospital to Mr. * and Mrs. Raymond Heath, of this city. S A son was born at the hospital on ' March 11, 1939, to Mr. and Mrs. Har- > ry Sawyer, of Melrose. i A son was born at the hospital, March 11, 1939, to Mr. and Mrs. Evrett McPeak, of Irving. A daughter was born March 12th, r 1939, to Mr. and Mrs. Ed Quinn, of d he town of Alma.
